summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6079 for the improvement of Brandon Street from 51st Avenue South to Wilson Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues, and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83555, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
